description: '''Home Service''' is a [[British folk rock]] group, formed in late 1980 from a nucleus of musicians who had been playing in [[Ashley Hutchings]]' [[Albion Band]]. Their career is generally agreed to have peaked with the album ''Alright Jack'',{{citation needed|date=September 2017}}  and has had an influence on later work.{{citation needed|date=September 2017}} [[John Tams]] and several other members of the band, have had solo careers and worked in other projects. In 2016 [[John Kirkpatrick (folk musician)|John Kirkpatrick]] replaced Tams as main singer in Home Service, and features as such on their next album.
